attributes.action: Action to be taken against Andrea Leadson after comments regarding male carers.
attributes.background: Andrea Leadsome made a public comment saying "parents would be sensible not to employ male carers...statistic show males are paedophiles and are drawn to working with children". Action should be taken against Andrea Leadsom for these comments against males working in nurseries and early years sector

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for taking action against MPs because of the views and opinions they express.
